description:
instance rebooting is currently broken in trunk due to bugs in compute.ap and the libvirt driver:

 *  In compute.api.reboot,  _cast_compute_message is called with incorrect parameters.  This prevents the reboot cast from ever reaching the compute host

  * in libvirt/connection.py, reboot is missing the reboot_type parameter, which causes a method signature error once the above issue is fixed
title: Instance rebooting is broken
